actions.text: Reported to House by House Committee on District of Columbia. Report No: 97-31.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Passed House by Yea-Nay Vote: 209 - 179 (Record Vote No: 164).
Laid on Table in House by Unanimous Consent.
Other Measure S.1040 Passed House in Lieu.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fiscal Affairs and Health

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act to increase the amount authorized to be appropriated as the annual Federal payment to the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Amends the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act to increase the amount authorized to be appropriated as the annual Federal payment to the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act to increase the amount authorized to be appropriated as the annual Federal payment to the District of Columbia.
